verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera svarūpa-vicāra śuna, sanātana
advaya-jñāna-tattva, vraje vrajendra-nandana

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; svarūpa-vicāra—consideration of the eternal form; śuna—please hear; sanātana—My dear Sanātana; advaya-jñāna-tattva—the Absolute Truth without duality; vraje—in Vṛndāvana; vrajendra-nandana—the son of Nanda Mahārāja.
translation: "O Sanātana, please hear about the eternal form of Lord Kṛṣṇa. He is the Absolute Truth, devoid of duality but present in Vṛndāvana as the son of Nanda Mahārāja.
